ComicInfo.Title: Between A Rick And A Hard Place
ComicInfo.Summary:
WHAT ARE LITTLE BOYS MADE OF? - Part 4 of 5. Dakota becomes a war zone of anti-gay violence as the Sons of Odin make a ferocious reappearance, forcing Static to intervene and enter into a fiery confrontation with one of his oldest enemies.
Virgil and Frieda argue about his attitude towards Rick. Virgil has a lot to consider about his prejudice. A mysterious girl watches Static fly home. Virgil has to miss school because he is really sick. Daisy, Frieda and Rick decide to go to a gay rights activist convention. The convention is attacked by a racist group, Sons of Odin. Static arrives to confront the leader who turns out to be...Hotstreak!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-21 06:40:29. [CVDB40338]
ComicInfo.Characters: Daisy Watkins, Dusk, Frieda Goren, Hot-Streak, Jean Hawkins, Larry Wade, Rick Stone, Sharon Hawkins, Static
